snippet: Vladimir V. Putin has spoken out against calls for a United Nations tribunal to investigate the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 over eastern Ukraine last year that killed 298 people.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin rejects United Nations tribunal for Malaysia Airlines Flight 17, which is believed to have been destroyed in 2014 by surface-to-air missile fired from territory controlled by pro-Russian separatists in eastern Ukraine.
lead_paragraph: Vladimir V. Putin has spoken out against calls for a United Nations tribunal to investigate the downing of Malaysia Airlines Flight 17 over eastern Ukraine last year that killed 298 people.

headline.main: Putin Rejects U.N. Tribunal for Downed Malaysian Jet
headline.print_headline: Putin Rejects U.N. Tribunal for Downed Malaysian Jet
